job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pOda processes thousands of real estate images every day to better understand and serve to different audiences with evolving interests and tastes As a machine learning engineer in our team youll help build and scale our cuttingedge Oda Optimization image processing and recommendation pipelinenbspppbrppWhat youll dopulliDevelop amp Train amp Monitor deep learning models to improve various Oda productsliliCollect amp Clean amp Generate custom datasets for DLML model trainingnbspliliDesign and implement software solutions to improve our image processing pipeline to personalize services to different clientsnbspliulpbrppWhat were looking forpulli2 years of industry experienceliliBS or MS in Computer Science Statistics or related fieldliliExperience working with CNN Autoencoder and Transformer architecturesnbspliliExpertise in Pytorch  Tensorflow or other GPU APIsliliHandson experience with data processing pipelines databases and large scale machine learning systemsliulpbrppNice to havepulliBackground in recommendation or computational advertisingliliWorking knowledge of Reinforcement Learning Algorithmsliulpbrp
